Name: Custom Machinery
About the game: Custom Machinery is a block based building game in which you can build vehicles and other machines, configure their parts and use them. Currently there are 42 different blocks many of which are highly configurable.Of these blocks there are 3 seperate types; -Structural Blocks: Blocks that are used for giving the vehicle its shape. -Movement Blocks: Blocks that move the vehicle by applying force to it. -Shape Changer Blocks: Blocks that change the shape of the vehicle. Vehicles can be saved in a text file and can be loaded from one. Which means they can be shared anywhere on the internet.
